Text.Name: Fish_StoneCrab
Text.Desc: Common crab that lives in dirt and rocks.

Text.Name: Fish_Ji
Text.Desc: Common freshwater fish that lives in all kinds of water bodies.

Text.Name: Fish_t6
Text.Desc: Fish that is commonly seen on Mt. Kunlun.

Text.Name: Fish_t8
Text.Desc: A large killifish that only lives on mountains and endures cold weather.

Text.Name: Fish_s3
Text.Desc: Bream that only lives at Heavenstep Peak. Likes to eat Iceflower.

Text.Name: Fish_s7
Text.Desc: Flatfish that only lives on northwestern mountains.

Text.Name: Fish_s9
Text.Desc: Flatfish that only lives on Mt. Blackstone. Affected by the Sword Pillars, it is black and tough and likes items of metal element.

Text.Name: Fish_ChillyCrab
Text.Desc: Crab with tasty meat that is only seen in cold areas.

Text.Name: Fish_BaiHuang
Text.Desc: A rare kind of naked carp that only lives in Lake Jakestone and shows up during winter. Its meat taste good and can be eaten directly.

Text.Name: Fish_s1
Text.Desc: A large killifish as white as snow that only rarely shows up in cold water areas.

Text.Name: Fish_r6
Text.Desc: A rare pond loach with sharp red fins that lives in cold areas and is said to only shows up during winter.

Text.Name: Fish_QingHei
Text.Desc: A kind of snakehead with a green head that is difficult to catch.

Text.Name: Fish_t2
Text.Desc: Common fish that is mainly seen around Mountainsouth.

Text.Name: Fish_s2
Text.Desc: A flat, common fish that is mainly seen in streams and rivers near Mountainsouth.

Text.Name: Fish_r8
Text.Desc: It is said that it only shows up near Taiyi Sect and comes with Polar Night. It has a large amount of stamina, so it has a name of "Water Fairy"

Text.Name: Fish_s5
Text.Desc: A pink Amur bream that is said to be a hybrid of carp and bream. During autumn, it swims from sea to river to spawn eggs and its body turns soft to adjust to the rocks in freshwater rivers.

Text.Name: Fish_t1
Text.Desc: Rare fish that has sweet, tasty meat. Lives in Celestial Pool and only shows up after autumn midnight.

Text.Name: Fish_t5
Text.Desc: A small fish that is often seen near Mt. Nelumbo.

Text.Name: Fish_r2
Text.Desc: A long, slim fish that lives in dirt near creeks.

Text.Name: Fish_r1
Text.Desc: Rare flatfish that lives on Mt. Shu.

Text.Name: Fish_r11
Text.Desc: A rare fish seen around Mt. Shu that likes Jade Essence. Maybe it is drawn by its Earth Qi.

Text.Name: Fish_FenLi
Text.Desc: Carp that is pink all over its body. Some think it is affected by the peach blossoms nearby.

Text.Name: Fish_t11
Text.Desc: Killifish that lives in swamps in Wild South and is said to have patterns all over its body because it has inhaled Demon Emperor's aura. Only shows up during spring.

Text.Name: Fish_r3
Text.Desc: A black, large pond loach that only shows up in Wild South.

Text.Name: Fish_Black
Text.Desc: Common freshwater fish that mostly lives in rivers.

Text.Name: Fish_BlueFish
Text.Desc: Rare blue carp that lives in large rivers. Its body has turned blue after absorbing Water Qi for generations.

Text.Name: Fish_Huang
Text.Desc: Golden fish that mostly lives in large rivers.

Text.Name: Fish_HongHuang
Text.Desc: Naked carp that has a red cap and rarely shows up in large rivers.

Text.Name: Fish_r13
Text.Desc: A white swamp eel with tasty, chewy meat that only lives in large rivers.

Text.Name: Fish_RedFish
Text.Desc: A red freshwater fish that lives deep in the river near Galepeak Town and only floats above during winter.

Text.Name: Fish_t10
Text.Desc: Killifish that lives in Spiritual Water.

Text.Name: Fish_JadeCrab
Text.Desc: Very rare crab that only shows up during the day. Its body has been affected by the Spiritual Water and become jade-like. Some cultivators pet them on Mt. Nulumbo.

Text.Name: Fish_s6
Text.Desc: A beautiful, translucent green bream that lives in Spiritual Water. All sects have kept some for ornamental purposes.

Text.Name: Fish_r5
Text.Desc: Pond loach that only lives in Spiritual Water and likes to eat Spirit Stones.

Text.Name: Fish_r12
Text.Desc: Rare swamp eel that lives in Spiritual Water, only shows up during summer and feeds on precious Spirit Roots.

Text.Name: Fish_XieLi
Text.Desc: Carp that only shows up in Thin Blood with demonic patterns on its body.

Text.Name: Fish_t3
Text.Desc: Snakehead with giant, pitch black eyes that only shows up in Blood Water.

Text.Name: Fish_s4
Text.Desc: Bream that only lives in Thin Blood and often attacks animals passing nearby.

Text.Name: Fish_s11
Text.Desc: Rare flatfish that lives in Blood Water with a strong odor that keeps it away from its predator. So, blood water ofter smells awful in Springs.

Text.Name: Fish_FireCrab
Text.Desc: Crab that lives in a hot region with a shell that helps it endure cold weather.

Text.Name: Fish_HongGui
Text.Desc: A red salmon with a whitish cap that shows up near Great Desert.

Text.Name: Fish_t4
Text.Desc: Fish that lives in desert. Born to endure hungry. Maybe it's because it only feeds on food of Wood element.

Text.Name: Fish_s10
Text.Desc: Flatfish that is seen in Great Desert.

Text.Name: Fish_r4
Text.Desc: Pond loach that lives near Igneocopper mines and feeds on minerals in the ores. Its body can emit heat.

Text.Name: Fish_r7
Text.Desc: A kind of loach that lives in desert.

Text.Name: Fish_t7
Text.Desc: Fish with a thick mouth that is often seen in sea.

Text.Name: Fish_t9
Text.Desc: Rare killifish that lives in sea.

Text.Name: Fish_t12
Text.Desc: Killifish that can only be seen during summer. Only few people have seen it in Poison Dragon Lake.

Text.Name: Fish_s12
Text.Desc: A large fish that lives in deep sea and only spawns in shallow areas.

Text.Name: Fish_s8
Text.Desc: Flatfish that is commonly seen in sea.

Text.Name: Fish_r9
Text.Desc: Eel that is commonly seen in sea.

Text.Name: Fish_r10
Text.Desc: Rare eel that lives in sea. The spotted pattern is possibly caused by it feeding on volcanic ash at the bottom of the sea.

Text.Name: Shrimp1
Text.Desc: Common shrimps, live in all fresh waters.

Text.Name: Shrimp2
Text.Desc: Common shrimps in the sea, with bigger size.

Text.Name: Shrimp3
Text.Desc: Shrimps that only live in mountains near the Skydome Palace.

Text.Name: Shrimp4
Text.Desc: Special red shell shrimps, can bear high temperature.

Text.Name: Shrimp5
Text.Desc: Shrimps that live in the desert, with small size.

Text.Name: Shrimp6
Text.Desc: Shrimps that live near the great river, with small size.

Text.Name: Shrimp7
Text.Desc: Shrimps that live near the Central Plain, not easy to catch.

Text.Name: Shrimp8
Text.Desc: Shrimps that live near the Wild South, taste bitter.

Text.Name: Shrimp9
Text.Desc: Shrimps that live in blood water, very fierce.

Text.Name: Shrimp10
Text.Desc: A shrimp that appears in the blood water on the mountains and only eats food of Fire element. Also shows up in other types of water due to its invasiveness.

Text.Name: Shrimp11
Text.Desc: Shrimps that only appear at Five Dragon Pond on summer nights. Their body glow, which is said because they only eat Metal element food.

Text.Name: Shrimp12
Text.Desc: Shrimps that only appear at Perennial Miasma in springs. Their pink bodies are effected by peach blossom.
